A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Few films have as lofty of expectations as the latest Star Wars films have and so far since the Disney takeover of LucasFilm\, those films have delivered. This is the first stumble. I have to agree with the early dissatisfaction of Mark Hamill who lamented what was done with his character\, Luke Skywalker. Now we know and it's not pretty. And with an over reliance on blockbuster cliches while being filled with plot holes so big the Millennium Falcon could fly through them\, The Last Jedi is far too long and overstuffed with tonally awkward jokes to resonate. The force is not so strong with this one.
